00166     int64_t size() {
00167       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00168       int64_t total = 0;
00169       for (LogFragmentQueue::iterator iter = m_fragment_queue.begin();
00170            iter != m_fragment_queue.end(); iter++)
00171         total += (*iter).size;
00172       return total;
00173     }
